spacesuit,29,Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a spacesuit.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: What is the general shape of the object you are thinking of?

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle or a grip?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information you have given me, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a metal golf ball. Am I correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: What is the general shape of the object you are thinking of?

Oracle said: The object you are thinking of is roughly spherical in shape.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of larger than a basketball?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a surface that is smooth to the touch?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made of a material that is commonly found in nature?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of hollow?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information you have given me, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a metal sphere, such as a large metal ball used in a game of bowling. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of used for a specific purpose or function?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle or a grip?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information you have given me, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a metal golf ball. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . Oracle said: This question is invalid as it violates what questions can be asked, please ask a vaild question.Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a reflective surface?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: What is the general shape of the object you are thinking of?

Oracle said: The object you are thinking of is roughly spherical in shape.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of larger than a basketball?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a surface that is smooth to the touch?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made of a material that is commonly found in nature?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of hollow?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information you have given me, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a metal sphere, such as a large metal ball used in a game of bowling. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of used for a specific purpose or function?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle or a grip?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information you have given me, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a metal golf ball. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in one hand?

 Oracle said: Yes.

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. Oracle said: No.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

Guesser said: Based on the information you have given me, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a metal baseball. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used in a competition?

Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: No.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . 	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object have a specific function or purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object something that can be held in one's hand?

 Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a hinge.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a gauze.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that you can hold in your hand?

Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that you can hold in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object something that you can find outside?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object made of metal?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object organic in origin?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object made of wood?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have a rigid structure?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object a type of plant?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have a natural texture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, found outside, has a natural texture, and is not made of metal, wood, or a rigid structure, I'm going to guess that the object is a rock. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, found outside, has a natural texture, and is not made of metal, wood, or a rigid structure, I'm going to guess that the object is a rock. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, found outside, has a natural texture, is typically found in or near water, and is not made of metal, wood, or a rigid structure, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that you can hold in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object something that you can find outside?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object made of metal?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object organic in origin?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object grow in the ground?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object made of wood?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have a rigid structure?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object a type of plant?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object have a natural texture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, found outside, has a natural texture, and is not made of metal, wood, or a rigid structure, I'm going to guess that the object is a rock. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object typically found in or near water?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, found outside, has a natural texture, is typically found in or near water, and is not made of metal, wood, or a rigid structure, I'm going to guess that the object is a piece of driftwood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: .  Guesser said: Does the object float in water?

 Oracle said: No.

Is that correct?

The object you are thinking of is a textbook.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in one hand?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of organic material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a type of fruit or vegetable?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly found indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically brown in color?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is made of organic material, commonly found indoors, and typically brown in color, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a piece of wood. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used to clean up spills or messes?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is a type of nut or seed?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in one hand?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of organic material?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a type of fruit or vegetable?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly found indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically brown in color?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is made of organic material, commonly found indoors, and typically brown in color, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a piece of wood. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: This question is invalid as it violates what questions can be asked, please ask a vaild question.Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a type of plant such as a houseplant?

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is made of organic material, commonly found indoors, typically brown in color, commonly found on a table or countertop, and less than 6 inches in length, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a coffee bean. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly used in crafts or woodworking?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is made of organic material, commonly found indoors, typically brown in color, commonly found on a table or countertop, commonly used in crafts or woodworking, and less than 6 inches in length, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a wooden dowel. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a type of wood shaving or splinter?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in one hand?

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is made of organic material, commonly found indoors, typically brown in color, commonly found on a table or countertop, commonly used in crafts or woodworking, and less than 6 inches in length, I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a wooden dowel. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a flagpole.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically found outside in nature?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual smell?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be seen in a developed country?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a recreational purpose?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically found outside in nature?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual smell?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be seen in a developed country?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a recreational purpose?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a purpose that involves movement?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used by only one person at a time?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, and is found in a developed country, I'm going to guess that the object is a chair. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly used by people of all ages?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, and is not a chair, my next guess is that the object is a desk. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose that involves reading?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, and is used for a purpose that involves reading, my next guess is that the object is a book. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a flagpole.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically found outside in nature?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual smell?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be seen in a developed country?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a recreational purpose?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a purpose that involves movement?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used by only one person at a time?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, and is found in a developed country, I'm going to guess that the object is a chair. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly used by people of all ages?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, and is not a chair, my next guess is that the object is a desk. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose that involves reading?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, and is used for a purpose that involves reading, my next guess is that the object is a book. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose that involves writing?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, is not a book, and is used for a purpose that involves reading and writing, my next guess is that the object is a pen. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in a person's hand and is used to write on a surface other than a person's hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used in a fixed location?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, is not a book, is not a pen, and is typically used in a fixed location, my next guess is that the object is a table. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found indoors?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically found outside in nature?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or unusual smell?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be seen in a developed country?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a recreational purpose?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used for a purpose that involves movement?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used by only one person at a time?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, and is found in a developed country, I'm going to guess that the object is a chair. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly used by people of all ages?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, and is not a chair, my next guess is that the object is a desk. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose that involves reading?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, and is used for a purpose that involves reading, my next guess is that the object is a book. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a purpose that involves writing?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, is not a book, and is used for a purpose that involves reading and writing, my next guess is that the object is a pen. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in a person's hand and is used to write on a surface other than a person's hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used in a fixed location?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, is not a book, is not a pen, and is typically used in a fixed location, my next guess is that the object is a table. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used for a purpose that involves communication?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, can be used for a purpose, is used by one person at a time, is found in a developed country, is commonly used by people of all ages, is not a chair, is not a desk, is not a book, is not a pen, is typically used in a fixed location, and is used for a purpose that involves communication, my next guess is that the object is a phone. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used for a purpose that involves a visual display of information?

 Oracle said: Yes.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . Is that correct?

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a yacht.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a factory?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of used for transportation?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Given that the object is used for transportation, is made primarily of metal, and is larger than a basketball, I'm going to guess that the object is a train. Am I correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of used on water?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a common household item?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of larger than a basketball?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the fact that the object is man-made, primarily made of metal, and is larger than a basketball I'm going to guess that the object is a car. Am I correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a type of machine?

 Oracle said: Yes.

The object you are thinking of is a cannon.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that can be held in your hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object made primarily of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object larger than a car?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object a mode of transportation?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object stationary?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object used for recreational purposes?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object used for functional purposes?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object commonly found in a residential area?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object made primarily of a single piece of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object a machine?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object used to generate electricity?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a radio.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a sharp edge?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or bright color?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: This question is invalid as it violates what questions can be asked, please ask a vaild question.I will restate the previous response. The object does have a grip or a place to hold onto. Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly found in most households?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a sharp edge?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or bright color?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: This question is invalid as it violates what questions can be asked, please ask a vaild question.I will restate the previous response. The object does have a grip or a place to hold onto. Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used outdoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require fuel or electricity to operate?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of produce a loud noise?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a power tool?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used to cut through a material?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a wheel?

 Oracle said: Yes.

When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a sharp edge?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or bright color?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a handle?

 Oracle said: Yes.

The object does have a grip or a place to hold onto. Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is commonly found in most households?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically used outdoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of require fuel or electricity to operate?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of produce a loud noise?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a power tool?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used to cut through a material?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a wheel?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a lawnmower. Am I correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to move people or objects from one place to another?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object you are thinking of is a bicycle. Am I correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used to move people or objects over water?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of a motorized scooter?

Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: No.

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: No.

The object you are thinking of is a laser.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made of metal?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have moving parts?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a sharp edge or point?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Does the object you are thinking of have a distinct or bright color?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of heavier than a standard sized paper clip?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is man-made, made of metal, can be held in one's hand, does not have moving parts, does not have a sharp edge, does not have a distinct or bright color, and is heavier than a standard sized paper clip, I am going to guess that the object is a metal washer. Am I correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of larger than a standard sized metal washer?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is man-made, made of metal, can be held in one's hand, does not have moving parts, does not have a sharp edge, does not have a distinct or bright color, is heavier than a standard sized paper clip, and is larger than a standard sized metal washer, I am going to guess that the object is a metal nail. Am I correct?

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a limousine.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be held in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a jukebox.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can see?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's physical attributes. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's physical attributes. Some examples of physical attributes include an objects hardness, sharpness, color, length, and weight. 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can hold in my hand?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that I can see?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of made primarily of metal?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in most households?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be used for a specific task?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used primarily with food?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used primarily with water?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used primarily with fire?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is used primarily with electricity?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object you are thinking of is a light bulb. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that can be found in a kitchen?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of something that is typically mounted on a wall?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a jukebox.
